original_text: When Joseph and Mary had done everything required by the Law of the Lord, they returned to Galilee to their own town of Nazareth.
korean_text: 주의 율법을 따라 모든 일을 마치고 갈릴리로 돌아가 본 동네 나사렛에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: When Joseph and Mary had done everything required
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉과 마리아가 요구된 모든 것을 행했을 때

sentences.original_text: by the Law of the Lord
to their own town of Nazareth
